title: House fails to pass articles of impeachment for Homeland Security Secretary Mayorkas
description: Republicans failed to advance impeachment articles for Department of Homeland Security Secretary Alejandro Mayorkas but left open the possibility of revisiting the vote at a later date.

title: Honda recalls 750,000 vehicles over air bag flaw
description: The recall includes the Honda Civic, Accord, CR-V, Fit, HR-V, Insight, Odyssey, Pilot, Passport, Ridgeline, as well as Acura MDX, RDX and TLX, mostly model years 2020 to 2022.

title: NTSB says key bolts were missing from the door plug that blew off a Boeing 737 Max 9
description: According to preliminary investigation findings released by NTSB investigators on Tuesday, four key bolts were "missing" when a door plug blew off an Alaska Airlines 737 Max 9 in midair last month.

title: The Census Bureau is dropping a controversial proposal to change disability statistics
description: After public outcries, the U.S. Census Bureau says it's no longer moving ahead with proposed survey changes that could have shrunk a key estimated rate of disability in the U.S. by about 40%.

title: Scientists explore whether to add a "Category 6" designation for hurricanes
description: Climate change is making powerful hurricanes more common. That may require adding a new official designation for the more intense storms, a new study suggests.

title: Congress devolves into chaos over border and national security funding
description: After months of bickering Congress remains completely unable to agree on any legislation on border security or aid to Israel and Ukraine — all priorities that majority of lawmakers agree are needed.

title: Federal appeals court rules Trump doesn't have broad immunity from prosecution
description: Tuesday's decision comes at a crucial time for both Trump and the federal case against him. He almost certainly will appeal the ruling either to the full D.C. Circuit or to the Supreme Court.

title: Top Dem in immigration talks says Republicans are ignoring border chaos to help Trump
description: Republican senators are now casting doubts on the new border security and foreign aid deal. Democratic Sen. Chris Murphy says they're caving to pressure from Trump to boost his reelection bid.

title: Country music star Toby Keith dies at 62
description: Keith announced on social media in 2022 that he had been having chemotherapy and radiation treatments for stomach cancer. He is behind such hits as "Red Solo Cup" and "Beer For My Horses."

title: How are atmospheric rivers affected by climate change?
description: California is in the grips of an atmospheric river that's causing flooding all over the state. Climate change might be intensifying storms like it — but scientists are still working out the details.

title: Bob Beckwith, the firefighter in the famous image with Bush after 9/11, dies at 91
description: Beckwith died Sunday night in hospice care after dealing with cancer in recent years, his wife, Barbara Beckwith, said Monday.

title: Here are Nevada's 2024 primary results
description: Voting concludes Tuesday in Nevada's primary election. Polls close at 7 p.m. local time/10 p.m. ET. View the live results.

title: Senate Republicans cast serious doubt on fate of bipartsian immigration deal
description: A bipartisan foreign military aid and immigration reform package is teetering ahead of a Wednesday vote in the face of Republican opposition.
